name: zkonacci
description: CTF game where players will need to create a zkProof that demonstrates the knowledge of the next number of the [Fibonacci sequence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fibonacci_number).

scripts.postinstall:
echo "\e[0;33mRunning trusted setup ceremony for testing  purposes.......... THIS WILL TAKE SOME MINUTES!!!\e[0m
" && sleep 5 && cd circuits && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 15 pot15_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot15_0000.ptau pot15_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot15_0001.ptau pot15_final.ptau -v
scripts.build: npm run build-circuits && npm run build-contracts
scripts.build-circuits: cd circuits && circom zkOnacci.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym && snarkjs zkey new zkOnacci.r1cs pot15_final.ptau zkOnacci_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute zkOnacci_0000.zkey zkOnacci_final.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey zkOnacci_final.zkey verification_key.json && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier zkOnacci_final.zkey verifier.sol && sed -i 's/\^0.6.11/\^0.8.6/' verifier.sol && mv verifier.sol ../contracts
